creator: jim@riggs.me
text:
mod_proxy_ajp is not properly ignoring a flush sent before the headers are received (functionality added in r579999 by jim).  A patch was provided and committed to trunk as r1153531 by Rüdiger.  Please backport to 2.2.x.

dev@ thread here:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/201108.mbox/%3C1B34CC00-2633-4871-ADBE-EA12FBBDB32E@riggs.me%3E
